summary.span: Enthält Klassen, die die Interoperation von Steuerelementen in Windows Forms und WPF unterstützen.

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Der -Namespace enthält Klassen, die die Interoperation [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] zwischen [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] den Technologien und ermöglichen.The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. Wenn Sie Klassen verwenden, können Sie Steuer [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] Elemente auf [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Seiten und [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Elemente in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-basierten Anwendungen hosten.When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. Die beiden Schlüssel Klassen, die Interoperation-Funktionen implementieren , sind und.The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . Welche Klasse Sie verwenden, hängt von der Implementierung des Steuer Elements ab:Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - Verwenden Sie die-Klasse, wenn Sie [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] ein-Steuer [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] Element auf einer Seite verwenden müssen.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - Verwenden Sie die-Klasse, wenn Sie [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ein-Element [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]in einer-basierten Anwendung verwenden müssen.Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
